definition: two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
both sides are willing/by mutual consent

sentences.english: A novel two-phase model for the fluidized bed of polyethylene with condensed mode operation was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 建立了气相法聚乙烯冷凝模式操作反应器的两相模型。

sentences.english: The mechanical seal for light hydrocarbon pump belong to the seal for liquid and gas phases.
sentences.chinese: 轻烃泵机械密封属于汽液两相密封。

sentences.english: The scanning electronic microscope results showed that double screw blending was better than single screw blending.
sentences.chinese: 双螺杆共混挤出，扫描电镜观察两相混合效果很好。

sentences.english: The three-dimension gas-particle flow in a spiral cyclone is simulated numerically.
sentences.chinese: 对螺旋型旋风分离器进行了两相流场的三维数值模拟。

sentences.english: Two-fluid model was employed to simulate two-phase phenomena of supersonic crossflow .
sentences.chinese: 对两相超声速横向喷射试验进行了数值模拟。

sentences.english: The finite difference method was used to discretize and solve the two phase energy equations.
sentences.chinese: 采用有限差分法对两相能量方程进行离散求解。

sentences.english: City Northeast Thousand Buddha Caves, cultural and natural landscape of two-phase of its America.
sentences.chinese: 城东北有千佛洞，人文与自然景观两相其美。

sentences.english: With the theory of gas-solid two-phase flow, computer simulation of sandblasting process was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 运用气固两相流动理论对喷砂过程进行了模拟和仿真。

sentences.english: A simple phenomenological model is proposed to describe the elastic-plastic deformation of two-phase particle composites.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种分析两相材料塑性响应的模型。

sentences.english: The size of microchannel had a great impact on two-phase friction pressure drop.
sentences.chinese: 然后对槽道内两相摩擦压降进行了实验研究和对比。

sentences.english: A novel two-phase model for the fluidize bed of polyethylene with condensed mode operation was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 建立了气相法聚乙烯冷凝模式操作反应器的两相模型。

sentences.english: Flow friction calculation is one of the basic problems of two phase flow in tubes.
sentences.chinese: 摩擦阻力计算是管内两相流动中的一个基本问题。

sentences.english: Improved models regarding dense gas-particle two-phase flow are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了模拟稠密气固两相流动的改进模型。

sentences.english: The deformation feature and the mechanism of these biphase W alloys have been also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文还讨论了两相钨合金的形变特点和形变机制。

sentences.english: This numerical method is the solution of full coupled two-phase flow .
sentences.chinese: 这是一个两相完全耦合的数值解方法。

sentences.english: L297 is a type of dedicated chip applied in control of two phase stepping motor.
sentences.chinese: L297是一种适用于两相步进电机控制的专用芯片。

definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to conform to/to fit with/to be compatible with
how can one endure?/to be able to endure
both sides (in contract)/the two opposing sides (in a dispute)
to consider/to weigh (a matter)/to balance (pros and cons)
attack from two sides/pincer movement/converging attack/attack on a flank/fork in chess, with one piece making two attacks
very close/no gap between them/continuously/unbroken/hard to separate/indistinguishable
